title: Perceived urban ecosystem services and disservices in gentrifying neighborhoods: Contrasting views between community members and state informants
content:
Publication date: February 2024

Source: Ecosystem Services, Volume 65

Author(s): Mary Kathryn Rodgman, Isabelle Anguelovski, Carmen Pérez-del-Pulgar, Galia Shokry, Melissa Garcia-Lamarca, James J.T. Connolly, Francesc Baró, Margarita Triguero-Mas
